title: In need of help
content:
Hi there!  
I have a few fonts I would like you to help me with. I really like the way the titles are made. I would like to know the name of the fonts but also if you know the names of the ding bats (I think that's what they are called LOL) of the lines, stars etc. that have been used to decorate the titles.  
Thanks a lot!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/example%201_4541.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/example%202_6075.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/example%203_3723.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/example%204_5945.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/example%205_4021.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015132701im_/http:/typophile.com/files/example%206_6079.jpg)
author: Lililoo123

comments.content: I guess I scared you all away with so many fonts LOL! Hope to get an answer for a few of them and the dingbats ;-) Thanks
